T02TD2482E:180a-1: badzra y'a na sth'u la patti /
T02TD2482E:180a-3: rdo rje theg pa'i sbom pa'i ltung ba /
T02TD2482E:180a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2482E:180a-5: bla ma'i zhabs kyi padma la //
T02TD2482E:180a-6: kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2482E:180a-7: sbom po'i ltung ba rnam pa brgyad //
T02TD2482E:180b-0: rgyud du @180b gsungs pa bri bar bya //
T02TD2482E:180b-1: shes rab stobs kyis len pa dang //
T02TD2482E:180b-2: de yi bdud rtsi stobs kyis len //
T02TD2482E:180b-3: snod min la ni mi gsang dang //
T02TD2482E:180b-4: tshogs kyi nang du rtsod pa dang //
T02TD2482E:180b-5: dad ldan la gzhan chos ston dang //
T02TD2482E:180b-6: nyan thos nang du zhag bdun gnas //
T02TD2482E:180b-7: brdzun gyis rnal 'byor nga rgyal byed //
T02TD2482E:180b-8: dad pa med la chos ston pa //
T02TD2482E:180b-9: 'di rnams sbom po'i ltung ba brgyad //
T02TD2482E:180b-10: rtsa ltung sbom po'i rim pa dag / cho ga yis ni shes bya zhing //
T02TD2482E:180b-11: nyams par gyur na bshags par bya //
T02TD2482E:180b-12: rdo rje theg pa'i sbom po'i ltung ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2482E:180b-14: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po padma k'a ra warma dang /
T02TD2482E:180b-15: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
T02TD2482E:180b-16: slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun pandi ta chen po ma ni ka shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02TD2482E:180b-17: cha ga la lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis zhus te dag par bgyis so//
